c74object.name: sy.convert
c74object.description: Converts the encoding of the incoming Unicode sequence.

objarg.name: from
objarg.description: Sets the input string format. Choose among the list at http://demo.icu-project.org/icu-bin/convexp (case insensitive).

objarg.name: to
objarg.description: Sets the output string format. Choose among the list at http://demo.icu-project.org/icu-bin/convexp (case insensitive). If a single argument is given, this is interpreted as the output encoding.

method.name: anything
method.description: Converts each individual symbol in the incoming list and outputs the result.

method.name: bang
method.description: Performs the conversion on the most recently received input list.

method.name: getlist
method.description: Outputs all the allowed encodings from the right outlet. Such encodings also have aliases, refer to http://demo.icu-project.org/icu-bin/convexp for a full list.

attribute.name: from
attribute.description: Sets the input string format. Default is "Unicode". For other values, choose from the list at http://demo.icu-project.org/icu-bin/convexp (case insensitive).

attribute.name: listout
maxdecimals
attribute.digest: Maximum Decimal Digits For Number Conversion
attribute.description: Sets the maximum number of decimals to be used for the conversion from number to symbol, in case the numbers attribute is set to "Convert To Symbol".

attribute.name: label
attribute.value: Maximum Decimal Digits For Number Conversion

attribute.name: numin
numout
subsseq
attribute.description: Sets the replacement characters for when conversion fails. Leave blank for dropping such characters (default).

attribute.name: to
attribute.description: Sets the output string format. Default is "Unicode". For other values choose among the list at http://demo.icu-project.org/icu-bin/convexp (case insensitive).
